Package schedulemanager.domain

Class DailyStatistics

java.lang.Object
schedulemanager.domain.DailyStatistics
public class DailyStatistics extends Object
Represents daily statistics comparing planned vs actual activities.

This class contains calculated metrics for a specific day, including quantitative accuracy, temporal accuracy, and other insights.

    • getQuantitativeAccuracy

      public double getQuantitativeAccuracy()
      Gets the quantitative accuracy (0.0 to 1.0).

      Quantitative accuracy measures how much of the planned time was completed in total volume, regardless of when it occurred.

      Returns:
      the quantitative accuracy (0.0 to 1.0)

    • setQuantitativeAccuracy

      public void setQuantitativeAccuracy(double quantitativeAccuracy)
      Sets the quantitative accuracy.
      Parameters:
      quantitativeAccuracy - the quantitative accuracy (0.0 to 1.0)

    • getTemporalAccuracy

      public double getTemporalAccuracy()
      Gets the temporal accuracy (0.0 to 1.0).

      Temporal accuracy measures how much of the planned time was completed within the planned time windows (overlap).

      Returns:
      the temporal accuracy (0.0 to 1.0)

    • setTemporalAccuracy

      public void setTemporalAccuracy(double temporalAccuracy)
      Sets the temporal accuracy.
      Parameters:
      temporalAccuracy - the temporal accuracy (0.0 to 1.0)
